title: Wings - The Future TODAY!
description: Supersonic is far too slow in this book!A pair of mathematical geniuses, SAVANT twins, fall in love with TV Science Fiction as children.They then spend their entire lives building the incredible machines that they saw on TV, making them all work perfectly which does not amuse all manner of people!The effect they have, literally, blows the World away!Kris Robbins is a 21st Century H G Wells style writer - Wings flies full of fantastic machines, planes, computers, cars and all manner of inventions and ideas that will stun your imagination!
author: Kris Robbins
